author: USA TODAY, Jessica Guynn, USA TODAY
title: Coronavirus price gouging: 33 top cops demand action from Amazon, eBay, Craigslist, Facebook and Walmart
description: Attorneys general demand that Amazon, Craigslist, EBay, Facebook, Walmart crack down on price gouging during the COVID-19 coronavirus pandemic.
content:
The CDC and a new study look at how long the coronavirus can live on surfaces.
USA TODAY
Attorneys general from across the country are demanding that the companies that stock Americas vast virtual shelves  Amazon, Craigslist, EBay, Facebook, Walmart  crack … [+4862 chars]
